Animal Shapes (Feather7 Tran): R75' 20 willing targets in 15' radius become chosen diminutive - huge animal or small - medium magical beast for 20 hr
Augury (Fate2 Divi): Self has 90% chance to learn weal or woe outcome of act up to 30 min in the future
Beast Shape III (Feather5 Tran): Self becomes diminutive (+6 Dexterity, -4 Strength, +1 AC) or huge (+6 Strength, -4 Dexterity, +6 AC) animal or small (+4 Dexterity, +2 AC) or medium (+4 Strength, +4 AC) magical beast for 20 min
Borrow Fortune (Fate3 Evoc): Self gains better of two immediate d20 rolls, then suffers worse of two d20 rolls for 2 rd
Break Enchantment (Fate5 Abju): R75' Self makes +15 check to free 20 targets in 15' radius from enchantments, transmutations, and curses
Calm Animals (Feather1 Ench): R75' 2d4+20 HD of animals in 15' radius become docile for 20 min (DC 13 Will neg)
Feather Fall (Feather2 Tran): R75' 20 targets in 10' radius fall 60'/rd for 20 rd (DC 14 Will neg)
Fly (Feather3 Tran): Touched gains 60' fly speed and +10 Fly skill for 20 min
Freedom Of Movement (Fate4 Abju): Touched moves freely for 200 min
Mass Fly (Feather6 Tran): R75' 20 targets in 15' radius gain 60' fly speed for 200 min
Miracle (Fate9 Evoc): Requests deity intercession
Mislead (Fate6 Illu): R75' Makes self invisible for 20 rd and creates false double (DC 18 Will disbelieve) for conc + 3 rd
Moment Of Prescience (Fate8 Divi): Self gains +20 attack, check, or save once w/in 20 hr
Shapechange (Feather9 Tran): Self becomes different animal of any size 1/rd for 200 min
Spell Turning (Fate7 Abju): 1d4+6 levels of non-area, non-ranged-touch spells directed at self reflect onto caster for 200 min
Summon Nature's Ally IV (Feather4 Conj): R75' 1 4th-, 1d3 3rd-, or 1d4+1 lower-level creatures appear and fight foes for 20 rd
Summon Nature's Ally VIII (Feather8 Conj): R75' 1 8th-, 1d3 7th-, or 1d4+1 lower-level creatures appear and fight foes for 20 rd
